name: Desert Bus of Hope
description: Made for the Desert Bus for Hope game jam, and inspired by 10 years of Desert Bus for Hope (and the outcome of the 2016 US Election), you're tasked with driving a rust-bucket of a bus through a desert road from Vegas to Tucson. However, the nuclear fallout has caused what little wildlife that is around to mutate. Rescue survivors and keep hope alive, because your bus lives and runs off of it.
